metadata.title: LWXQWDS Christmas Pajamas for Family Christmas Pjs Matching Sets for Adults Kids Baby Dog Holiday Xmas Sleepwear Set
features: Material: This christmas pajamas for family are made of high quality cotton blend, smooth and soft, no odor, no worry scratch the skin, wear breathable and comfortable.
Features: Family christmas pjs matching sets, cute deer printed long sleeve tshirt tops and black red plaid pants, holiday xmas sleepwear set for adults and kids, full of christmas elements.
Sold Separately: The christmas pjs are sold separately, please check the size carefully before ordering.
Occasion: Perfect for christmas home party, family holiday pjs, family matching pajamas for dad mom kids girl boy baby dog.
Hand/machine wash in cold water, do not bleach, hang dry.
description: Christmas Pajamas for Family Christmas Pjs Matching Sets for Adults Kids Baby Dog Holiday Xmas Sleepwear Set Specification: Style: casual Material: cotton blend Pattern: print Sleeve Length: long sleeve Color: white Promise If the product has any quality problems,please feel free to contact us,we will help you solve the problem as quickly as possible.
